selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform arithmetic operations such as subtraction to find the number of remaining objects.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to calculate the total number of objects remaining after subtracting the identified objects.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a single line output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the final count of remaining objects in the specified format.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_objects_from_text
new_skill_specs.purpose: Identify and count specific types of objects described in the text.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with object descriptions as keys and their counts as values.
edge_cases: Text does not contain any of the specified object descriptions.

tests.input: text='There are 3 large rubber spheres and 2 big shiny cylinders.', object_descriptions=['large rubber spheres', 'big shiny cylinders']
text='No large rubber spheres or big shiny cylinders here.', object_descriptions=['large rubber spheres', 'big shiny cylinders']
